meanings.definition: A type of smoked liver sausage.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious braunschweiger sandwich for lunch.
meanings.sent2: My mom bought some braunschweiger from the deli.
meanings.sent3: The braunschweiger made the sandwich taste unique.
meanings.sent4: The braunschweiger added a rich flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent5: The braunschweiger was the star of the charcuterie board.

meanings.sent1: The braunschweiger greeted us warmly at the town festival.
meanings.sent2: Many braunschweigers attended the local soccer match.
meanings.sent3: The braunschweiger shared funny stories about the town.
meanings.sent4: She was as rooted in Braunschweig as the ancient trees.
meanings.sent5: The braunschweiger proudly displayed the city's flag.
